葄字的基本解释

葄
zuò
垫（动词）：“葄枕图史。”

葄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zuò］
［《集韻》存故切，去莫，從。］
(1)藉；垫。
(2)水草名。即慈姑。

葄字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　葄； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1043第25
【集韻】存故切【正韻】靖故切，?音祚。水芋也。　又【韻會】藉也。【唐書·李揆傳】葄枕圖史。　又叢租切。與蒩通。【類篇】蒩菰，草名。蒩或作葄。　【集韻】或作?。

葄字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
葄字的起名意思

暂无。

pillow

Pad (verb): "The history of a pillow with a pillow."
pillow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zuò］
["Ji Yun" keep the old and cut, go to Mo, follow. ]
(1) Borrow; advance.
(2) The name of the aquatic plants. That is, aunt.
pillow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　葄; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1043 Page 25
【Ji Yun】Cut the old rhyme [Zheng Yun] The old rhyme is cut, and the sound is Zuo. The taro also.　[Rhyme Club] also borrowed. [Tang Shu·Li Kui Biography] The history of the picture of a pillow.　Cong rent cut again. And 蒩通. 【Classes】Quanlan, grass name.蒩 or 葄葄.　【Jiyun】or make?.
